com.vais.controllers

Class OrderController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vais.controllers.OrderController

  • @Controller
 @Transactional
 @SessionAttributes(value={"userId","role"})
public class OrderController
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Eduard .This controller is responsible for manipulations with order entities in database via Hibernate, from front end layer.

      • addOrder

        @Transactional(rollbackFor=java.lang.Exception.class)
 @RequestMapping(value="/orders",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String addOrder(org.springframework.ui.ModelMap model,
                                                                                                                                                         @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                                                                                                         java.lang.Long[] carId,
                                                                                                                                                         @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                                                                                                         java.lang.String driver,
                                                                                                                                                         @RequestParam(required=true)
                                                                                                                                                         java.sql.Date startDate,
                                                                                                                                                         @RequestParam(required=true)
                                                                                                                                                         java.sql.Date endDate)
        this method adds new order made on FE into database by calling hibernate data access repository,
        Parameters:
        model - spring ModelMap is required to check user access modifier
        carId - array of selected cars
        driver - is driver included into the order or not
        startDate - beginning of the order
        endDate - and of the order
        Returns:
        appropriate redirect link

      • getOrders

        @RequestMapping(value="/orders",
                method=GET)
public org.springframework.ui.Model getOrders(org.springframework.ui.ModelMap modelMap,
                                                                                                             org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        this method retrieves orders based on user role from data base
        Parameters:
        modelMap - required to check user access modifier
        model - spring UI model, used to retrieve data into FE
        Returns:
        spring Model

                method=GET)
public java.lang.String getOrder(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                          org.springframework.ui.ModelMap modelMap,
                                                                                                          @PathVariable
                                                                                                          java.lang.Long orderId)
        Retrieves specified order
        Parameters:
        model - spring UI model, used to retrieve data into FE
        modelMap - required to check user access modifier
        orderId - path
        Returns:
        redirect link

      • setOrderStatus

        @RequestMapping(value="/orders/change/{orderId}")
public java.lang.String setOrderStatus(org.springframework.ui.ModelMap modelMap,
                                                                                          @PathVariable
                                                                                          java.lang.Long orderId,
                                                                                          @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                                          java.lang.String setStatus)
        this method update changes of order status. Only manager is allowed to change status
        Parameters:
        modelMap - required to check user access modifier
        orderId - path variable which specify order
        setStatus - status that has to be applied
        Returns:
        redirect link
